name: Saketa
description:
At Saketa, we are providers of ready-to-use SharePoint solutions. We are product specialists and thought leaders, setting out to make SharePoint collaboration portals & intranet sites among other user-engaging, productive, and intuitive platforms. Our goal is to create these types of platforms for organizations of all sizes at an affordable cost. Our packaged solutions, add-ins, and apps are built on a robust Saketa framework that is easy to maintain, upgrade, and customize.
Additionally, our solutions are compatible with Office 365 (Cloud), On-premises and hybrid SharePoint deployments. 
READ MORE...
